ComicInfo.Title: The American Way of Death, Part Four: Conclusion
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dredd has looked Death in the eye before… but never like this! He realizes The only way to beat the Dark Judges is to send them back to Deadworld in a crazy sacrifice play involving D-jump machines as well as a whole lot of blood, sweat and ammo. His only allies: a turncoat Dark Judge, a furry ex-con with a pickaxe, and… what’s this? A long-lost love from Dredd’s past, back to settle up an old debt?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Shane Pierce | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Michael Avon Oeming | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-09-07 09:31:50. [CVDB459194]
ComicInfo.Characters: Chief Judge Cal, Chief Judge McGruder, Judge Blank, Judge Burroughs, Judge Choke, Judge Death, Judge Dredd, Judge Fear, Judge Fire, Judge Fistula, Judge Metastasis, Judge Mortis, Judge Skinner, Judge Sleep, Judge Stigma
ComicInfo.Teams: Council of Five, Dark Judges, Judges of Mega-City One, Special Judicial Squad
